dmca.title: [ABUSE] FW: Notice of copyright infringement (http://www.templatezone.com.br/)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 21, 2005 3:37 PM
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] FW: Notice of copyright infringement
(http://www.templatezone.com.br/)

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Total Control Sales <totalcontrol@theplanet.com>
To: <aalmeida@theplanet.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Monday, February 21, 2005, 10:43:27 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] FW: Notice of copyright infringement
(http://www.templatezone.com.br/)

===8<==============Original message text===============
Ryan,

Thank you for this email.  You should receive a response soon.  Thanks!

Regards,
Amanda Dickens
Total Control Account Executive
The Planet
800-377-6103
Main 214-782-7800
Fax 214-782-7754
Offering fully managed hosting and colocation services since 1994. State of
the art 60,000 sq. ft. n+1 data center, 24x7x365 live NOC~ 100% uptime
guarantee--------www.theplanet.com



- -----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Cathcart [mailto:piracy@templatemonster.com]
Sent: Monday, February 21, 2005 9:08 AM
To: totalcontrol@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of copyright infringement (http://www.templatezone.com.br/)

Dear Sirs,

It has come to our attention that your or one of your customer's
servers IP address (69.56.143.106), is involved in a grave situation
of unauthorized distribution intellectual and graphic property.

Site http://www.templatezone.com.br/ contains and distributes web templates
and
designs using our trademark TemplateMonster(tm). Their products are full of
infringing materials that have no license support documentation from
the design owning company.
http://www.templatezone.com.br/kit_monster.asp?produto=251

However, these templates are created and owned by our company,
www.templatemonster.com, Artvertex, Inc. Our company have all rights
on those templates and designs. All designers that have author rights
are our employee. Their contract rules transmit all ownership rights
to our company.

We direct your attention to the terms of our company's License
Agreement (http://www.templatemonster.com/terms.php) which also clearly
prohibits the reselling of our products by any potential or current
customer.

Our website clearly states "Website pages content copyright - 2002-2003
Artvertex, Inc." The permission of http://www.templatezone.com.br/
commercial actions from your server is illegal.
Templatemonster.com website content cannot be reproduced, copied, or edited
in any manner or medium and is therefore making you posses illegal material.
US copyright
laws protect all parts of this material. The owner of this website has been
notified of his actions, and has been told the consequences.

Hence, we demand the immediate removal of
http://www.templatezone.com.br account from your company
server and cease the reselling of any of our products IMMEDIATELY.
We have already notified our corporate lawyers of this situation and we
shall not hesitate to exercise our legal right to pursue this matter in a
court of
law should you fail to meet our demand immediately.

Templatemonster.com is committed to investigating licensing infractions not
only to protect our own interests but to protect those of the designers who
submit their
designs to us as well. We are contractually obliged to protect the
intellectual property rights
and livelihood of the artists whose work we license.  While we support
freedom of expression, we
must enforce our licensing conditions rigorously in order to meet our
responsibilities. We
feel that your cooperation regarding this matter is fully warranted, and
expect it will be
promptly forthcoming.

Thank you and awaiting for your prompt answer.

- ---
Best regards,
Ryan Cathcart
Legal assistant
Artvertex, Inc.
22 Jordan Road
NY, Troy, 12180
Tel:  19174770358 ext 106
ICQ:  203233321
mailto:piracy@templatemonster.com

===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCGlRsvK/XpJs6oyURAh1OAJ9orkPFd8gaA6h7RXzDE0ibakQ3qgCeJTAk
TGzGR8dYCHQduGVLgFE1K9c=
=U86B
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
